snippet: Huang Qi, a well-known human-rights advocate and blogger, was taken from his home by police officers.
abstract: Chinese human rights advocate and blogger Huang Qi is taken from his home in Chengdu by police officers and his computer equipment confiscated.
lead_paragraph: Huang Qi, a well-known human-rights advocate and blogger, was taken from his home by police officers.

headline.main: Chinese Police Detain Activist Who Runs Website
